prompts: Create a rocky Pokemon that can withstand heavy hits and has a blue and gray color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that rolls into a ball, showcasing a unique mix of rock and ground types.
Show me a sturdy Pokemon with a sturdy body and a tough shell, perfect for battles in tough terrains.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a boulder, with shades of blue and gray, ready for a rocky adventure.
Make a Pokemon that blends into mountainous environments, featuring a round, heavy-set body and a tough exterior.
Design a Pokemon that is both formidable and grounded, with a mixture of sharp and round features.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with a distinctive rocky texture and vibrant blue accents.
